alerts.terminal: This will be a small Gnome like terminal. Just to input some funny basic commands. Some commands can change the website looks and some of them will be just for fun. The terminal is yet work in progress and will be updated continuously. 😃 😃 😃

form.loading: Please wait your Message is being processed 🙏
form.sendSuccess: Thank you very much, Your text has be successfully sent. I will answer your as soon as possible 🙂
form.sendFailed: Opps! 🙁 Unfortunately your text could not be sent. Please try again if did not Work send me direct message on Instagram.

001.des: Dream Style is a nice and simple Website for a Barber Shop or Barber Salon

002.des: MyBooks is a Progressive Web App (PWA) designed to help users manage their physical library at home. Built with SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI for styling, the app leverages SupaBase for the backend. Users can track their book collection, including details about each book and its author. The application is designed to be self-hosted, ensuring privacy and control over personal library data.

intro.coding: Programming is passion not a job!
